mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Movie(title, director, genre, rating, detail, poster, runningtime, link, releasedate, closedate) VALUES(#{title}, #{director}, #{genre}, #{rating}, #{detail}, #{poster}, #{runningtime}, #{link}, #{releasedate}, #{closedate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie order by moviesrn desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE Movie SET title=#{title}, director=#{director}, genre=#{genre}, rating=#{rating}, detail=#{detail}, poster=#{poster}, runningtime=#{runningtime}, link=#{link}, releasedate=#{releasedate}, closedate=#{closedate} WHERE moviesrn = #{moviesrn}
